name: Car Bump 3D
shortDescription: A fun 3D casual game where you drive a bumper-equipped car to clear obstacles and reach the finish line.
fullDescription:
Car Bump 3D is an engaging 3D casual game with a simple premise: control a car with a powerful bumper to clear a path through chaotic levels. Players must push and scatter various obstacles—such as balls, blocks, and sticks—off the track to successfully navigate the course and race toward the finish line.

Key Features:

  • Simple Controls: Enjoy one-touch driving and bumping mechanics that are easy to pick up and play.
  • Satisfying Physics: Experience satisfying, physics-based action as you clear obstacles from the track.
  • Level Progression: Advance through numerous levels, each with a defined start and finish goal.
  • Vibrant Graphics: Features a colorful, low-poly 3D aesthetic that makes the bumping action fun and visually appealing.
